# NEXO Agency

> NEXO is a leading digital agency in Israel specializing in web development, e-commerce solutions, branding, AI automation, and digital marketing. We help businesses build modern, high-performance digital experiences with a focus on the Israeli market.

## About

NEXO Agency provides comprehensive digital services for businesses of all sizes across Israel. Our team combines creative design with technical expertise to deliver results-driven solutions. We specialize in Hebrew-first digital experiences with RTL (right-to-left) design optimization.

**Founded:** Israel
**Primary Language:** Hebrew (he-IL)
**Website:** https://nexo.agency
**Email:** sales@nexoagency.org
**Phone:** +972-53-362-2423

## Services

### Web Development (בניית אתרים)
- [Web Development Overview](/services/web-development): Custom website development services
- [Landing Pages](/services/web-development/landing-pages): High-converting landing page design
- [WordPress Sites](/services/web-development/wordpress): WordPress development and customization
- [Web Applications](/services/web-development/web-apps): Custom web app development
- [Corporate Sites](/services/web-development/corporate-sites): Professional business websites
- [Catalog Sites](/services/web-development/catalog-sites): Product catalog websites

### E-commerce (חנויות אונליין)
- [E-commerce Overview](/services/ecommerce): Online store development
- [Shopify Development](/services/ecommerce/shopify): Shopify store setup and customization
- [WooCommerce](/services/ecommerce/woocommerce): WooCommerce development
- [Payment Integration](/services/ecommerce/payments): Payment gateway setup
- [Inventory Management](/services/ecommerce/inventory): Stock management systems

### Branding (מיתוג)
- [Branding Overview](/services/branding): Complete branding services
- [Logo Design](/services/branding/logo-design): Professional logo creation
- [Visual Identity](/services/branding/visual-identity): Brand visual systems
- [Brand Book](/services/branding/brand-book): Brand guidelines documentation
- [Copywriting](/services/branding/copywriting): Brand messaging and content

### AI & Automation (בינה מלאכותית)

- [Business Automation](/services/ai-automation/automation): Workflow automation
- [AI Content](/services/ai-automation/ai-content): AI-assisted content creation

### Digital Marketing (שיווק דיגיטלי)

## Content

### Blog
Our blog features in-depth guides and articles about digital marketing, web development, SEO, and business growth - primarily in Hebrew for the Israeli market.

- [Blog Home](/blog): All articles and guides

- [Local SEO Guide](/blog/local-seo-guide-israel-2025): Local search optimization
- [Landing Page Guide](/blog/landing-page-guide-israel-2025): Creating effective landing pages

## Technical Information

This website is a Single Page Application (SPA) built with:
- **Framework:** React with React Router
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS
- **SEO:** react-helmet-async for meta tags
- **Deployment:** Vercel

### Structured Data
All pages include JSON-LD structured data:
- Organization schema on homepage
- Service schemas on service pages
- Article/BlogPosting schemas on blog posts
- FAQPage schemas on FAQ sections
- BreadcrumbList for navigation context

### Sitemap
XML sitemap available at: https://nexo.agency/sitemap.xml
